page.title: 05TRADE IN HOLTON-LE-CLAY.
page.content: {Newsagents (2) Grocers (2) Post Office {(1) Hairdressers (1) Butcher (1) {Garages (2) Take away food shops (3) {Hardware shop (1) Wool shop (1) Pubs {(2) Off licenes (1). In the last ten years an increase in population has led to a new shopping centre being built. The{newsagents}was built in 1963.There are five people working part time.They sell cigarettes, newspapers, sweets, toys, cards, perfumes and toiletries. The most popular newspaper is the Evening Telegraph.The{Spar shop}was built in 1952. It sells groceries wines and spirits. In one corner is a {Post Office.}It sells stamps and deals with pensions. The dearest product in the shop is champagne.The cheapest is sweets.The most popular food is baked beans.
